2. Install and local run¶

Prerequisite¶

  1. Install Python and pip

    $ python --version
Python 3.10.11

    $ pip --version
pip 23.3.2

  2. Install git

    $ git --version
git version 2.39.1.windows.1
  • Local install with pip and run
    • Install and run
    • Flake8 linting
    • Pytest coverage
  • Local install with poetry and run (recommended)
    • Install and run
    • Flake8 linting
    • Pytest coverage
